response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. This extraordinary item is not just an investment; it's a gateway to unlocking unparalleled opportunities and enhancing your lifestyle in ways you might not have imagined. Given its intrinsic worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. I understand that making such a significant purchase requires careful consideration, and I assure you that this offer represents an exceptional value. Should you choose to accept this offer, you'll be joining a distinguished group of individuals who have already recognized the true potential of this product. I look forward to discussing this further with you and helping you through every step of the process. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 1200000}
